data.title: Fully Automated Data Estate Modernization to Databricks with LeapLogic - Data + AI Summit 2024
data.meta_description: Migrating legacy data architecture to a modern platform like Databricks can help enterprises accelerate their GenAI journey, improve operational resiliency, unlock advanced analytics, and support long-term business goals. But how do you make this journey risk-free? Join us on June 11 at 2:50 PM PT to experience an automated, disruption-free migration of legacy systems to Databricks Lakehouse with 100% preservation of business logic. Discover how LeapLogic, Impetus’ cloud migration accelerator, eliminates unpredictability by transforming legacy code to Databricks' Data Intelligence Platform. See how automating the end-to-end modernization journey brings scale, speed, and reliability, driving your organization toward success in the GenAI era.
data.text:
Migrating legacy data architecture to a modern platform like Databricks can help enterprises accelerate their GenAI journey, improve operational resiliency, unlock advanced analytics, and support long-term business goals. But how do you make this journey risk-free? Join us on June 11 at 2:50 PM PT to experience an automated, disruption-free migration of legacy systems to Databricks Lakehouse with 100% preservation of business logic. Discover how LeapLogic, Impetus’ cloud migration accelerator, eliminates unpredictability by transforming legacy code to Databricks' Data Intelligence Platform. See how automating the end-to-end modernization journey brings scale, speed, and reliability, driving your organization toward success in the GenAI era.
